name: Spyro: Year of the Dragon - Collector's Edition
summary: The Collectors' Edition version of Spyro: Year of the Dragon. This game is part of a trilogy released in the Spyro Collectors' Edition boxset. This version is mostly the same as the original. The only key difference is the words "Collectors' Edition" on both the disc and manual. The manual also has a white Playstation banner instead of the typical black banner.
